title: We almost went a week without me making a rage post.
body:
But im 9 games into my placements im 4/5 and i lost atleast 3 of said placements to trolls and feeders.

I climbed from silver 3 mmr up to low plat high gold mmr then lost all of it in literally 3 games worth of shitty teams.

How in the actual fuck is that fair.

And more importantly how is it that i a bronze 5 player, can play fucking decent in low plat, but cant get out of fucking bronze.

Revist the mmr system when?

Oh and the worst part of all of this, because i dodged games that i got autofilled, im now going to finish this placement in bronze, with silver 2 mmr, on an account that peaked in low plat mmr.

Which is fucking ridiculous.

replies.body: im just curious how is silver 4 mmr high gold low plat? rofl delusional much.

i dodged about 11 games, so i got placed lower than the mmr i was playing in.

the first 9 games of my placements both teams were around gold 4-2 with the occasional plat peppered in.

Stating facts =/= delusional.
To the best of my knowledge, dodging doesn't affect your placements, MMR affects your placements and you don't lose MMR for dodging, only LP.

That's SoloQ for you... Just as you're doing well and think "Oh, I might actually get a higher rank" you get feeders. It also doesn't help that Riot deliberately manipulate a player's MMR if they start doing even the slightest bit well. 

I've played with Platinum - Challenger players before, and I held my own. And I'm *Bronze 4*. Honestly, if my MMR weren't so stuffed that even with a 60-70% winrate I still get demoted, I would be out of Bronze by now.

Can confirm you are one of the few players i found that were around my level of play in bronze.

You should be atleast silver.
Hmm intersting calling your self a b5 when your s4. As for why u can't climb. Part of the reason might just be kayn is a really shitty mid laner

Because this is the same person who owns the YellowBrickRoad account, which is hardstuck Bronze 5. S/he made a new account just for Kayn. 

I've played against her/him, back when I was B5, and s/he's actually really good. The only reason I won was because her/his team fed.
OK if he has played over 900 ranked games and he's still stuck where he is. Then  obviously he is doing something wrong.
you should be taking opgg mmr with more than a grain of salt...
i mean when it says im around silver 2 and im playing with silver2-gold 4 on both teams id say its pretty accurate.
yeah, all op.gg does is guess and honestly it's probably even less accurate for OCE than it already is for NA
